Description:
DEERï¼ˆé¹¿è·‘å›¢ï¼‰æ˜¯ç”±çƒ­çˆ±æˆ·å¤–è·‘æ­¥å’Œå¥åº·ç¾é£Ÿçš„æœ‹å‹è‡ªå‘ç»„æˆï¼ŒåŸºäºç‰¹æ‹‰ååŒ—éƒ¨åŠå‘¨è¾¹åœ°åŒºï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å‘å±•å’Œé¼“åŠ±æœ¬åœ°åäººå¿«ä¹è·‘æ­¥ï¼Œå¥åº·é¥®é£Ÿï¼Œå¿—æ„¿å…¬ç›Šçš„éç›ˆåˆ©å›¢ä½“ã€‚ä¸­æ–‡åç§°ä¸º â€œé¹¿è·‘å›¢â€ æˆ–è€… â€œé¹¿è·‘ç¾¤â€ ï¼Œè‹±æ–‡å…¨ç§°ä¸º â€œDEER Running"ã€‚é¹¿è·‘å›¢ç§¯æå€¡å¯¼å¥åº·ã€å¿«ä¹ã€å…¬ç›Šã€ç¯ä¿çš„è¿åŠ¨ç†å¿µï¼Œå®šæœŸç»„ç»‡è·‘æ­¥æ´»åŠ¨ï¼Œå‘å¸ƒæ´»åŠ¨ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œåˆ†äº«è¿åŠ¨ç»éªŒï¼ŒæŠ¥åè·‘æ­¥èµ›äº‹ï¼Œå‚åŠ å¿—æ„¿å…¬ç›ŠæœåŠ¡ç­‰ã€‚
DEER Running Club is a spin-off from the Marathon Relay Teams organized by staff and parents from Delaware's Chun Hui Chinese School after three years of participation in Delaware's Running Festival in Wilmington on Mother's Day since 2015.

On July 26, 2017, DEER Running Club was officially named to include amateur, serious, and professional Chinese runners in Delaware and surrounding areas. 
â€‹
DEER promotes healthy and happy lifestyles and environmental awareness.
â€‹
We all meet in DE as runnERs. Go Deers!

We are a group of Chinese Runners in San Antonio, Texas. Our team English name is San Antonio Chinese Runners. We run together regularly.

Name: ç™¾é§¿ Bergen Runners
Description: Bergen Runners is a group of runners who believe in supporting and cheering for one another. We come from North NJ townships along Route 4, Route 17 and west of the Hudson River. Away from running, we come from all walks of life: professionals, scientists, artists, parents, husbands, wives, children, couples, singles, etcâ€¦Our running paths wind through major parks and hidden trails in various neighborhoods. Together, we run into the sunrise and sunset; we sweat and laugh through personal and physical challenges.

Name: ä¸œå¥”è¥¿è·‘ï¼ŒWERun
Location: Loantaka Brook Reservation (468 South St, Morristown, NJ 07962); Brookside Ave. (200 Glen Ave, Millburn, NJ 07041); åŒ—æ¹– (Orange Reservoir)
Description: WERun (West-East Run) is a NJ running group formed in social media in 2015. Most of its memers reside in Millburn/Livingston and nearby towns. The mission of the group is to promote running as a healthy living style and help each other to achieve such goal. It has been very active with multiple weekly activities, such as long runs and speed trainings. Members have participated in many running race events in NJ / NY, from local 5k for charities to TCS NYC Marathon. Today it has more than 300 members and is growing.
